column2: (let* ((base (make-temp-file "neovm-file-modes-eval-" t)) (f (expand-file-name "alpha.txt" base))) (with-temp-buffer (insert "x") (write-region nil nil f)) (prog1 (let ((default-directory (file-name-as-directory base))) (integerp (file-modes "alpha.txt"))) (delete-file f) (delete-directory base)))
